FuncDef:
The tunnel-per-user command configures the tunnel for each L2TP user on the LAC.
The undo tunnel-per-user command deletes the tunnel of each L2TP user.
By default, the tunnel for each L2TP user on the LAC is not configured.
ExtraInfo: To allow an L2TP user to use a tunnel on the LAC, run the tunnel-per-user command. If the Tunnel per user field is displayed as 1 in the display l2tp-group command output, the tunnel-per-user command has been run.
